content.body: Hi. Does the ECMA-262 follows something similar to BCP 14? I mean, Is there any rules for the keywords like "must", "required", "should", and such.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Hi. Does the ECMA-262 follows something similar to BCP 14? I mean, Is there any rules for the keywords like "must", "required", "should", and such.

content.body: We try to stay vaguely consistent but mostly by avoiding those words
So everything in the spec that isn’t a note could be thought of as “must”
